TopicTitle: [0.21] Kerbal LiveFeed: Passive Multiplayer Plugin/Client/Server v0.7.1

Articles.Content: This mod is great, but why can't we watch other ships in the tracker? Furthermore, it'd be nice to see it outside of map view. I swear this mod used to support this functionality a long time ago, or maybe it was another mod. That being said, thanks for the hard work!

hot to disable screenshot restriction? we have a autoclicker for 1.5s and we get the restrictions.

Edited June 19, 2013 by oggylt

It would be interesting to see how far users would take this if it was open-sourced.

EDIT: How did I not see the link labeled "GitHub Repo"?

Edited June 20, 2013 by lordgoogol
Will our mods work with the MP servers?
Is anyone else having connection refused to both servers in the first post?

Sax, if your asking "Can I use KLF if I have x, y, and z mods?" .. then the answer is yes. it doesn't matter AT ALL what mods you have, or the people viewing you have (other than KLF itself).

oggylt, umm, if you want something that updates THAT fast, why not just use Google+ Hangout? you can have it display the KSP app window directly. the FPS would be much better. (and the server space wont be wasted saving a pic every 1.5 seconds).
Um, in the download I got two application things called "KLFClient" and "KLFServer" what am I supposed to do with them?
Once you download KLF, then you follow the instructions, then you're good to go. :\
looks like servers may be down cant even get server status
servers down? even the status page cant be reached... what happened?
oh... same here then, i was just about to ask if im banned or something
Looks like Windows Server 2012 had crashed. No biggie, except that I don't wake up until about 3:00PM, because I work until 1AM. Doing some maintenance and it'll be up soon.
i can't use it when i try to run the client.exe it says that it can't open it. i'm on mac OSX Lion please help me i want to play.
Down again.
Same problem as Silver Eagle here. The download link leads to a .exe, and us mac users can't run .exe's. If LiveFeed isn't compatible with Macs then please change the OP.
Here is the error I'm seeing that SodiumEyes may have some advice with: 'The exception unknown software exception (0x0434352) offurred in the application at location 0xf032811c.

Silver Eagle, Scorpi15...

in the OP it CLEARLY says :

Note that Mono is required to run the client/server on Linux and Mac.

so now, get Mono, install it, set it up, run it, THEN try KLF.

You can run .exes on windows. .exe is a file extension. Although traditionally used by windows applications it is also used by .net/mono. Clearly states in the OP that it can be run with mono on mac and Linux. If you can't be bothered to read that then you wouldn't bother reading a notice stating incompatibility with mac either.

Sorry, I didn't know what mono was. I thought it was short for something, like how everyone calls macintosh computers just a mac or something like that. I wondered what it could have been and I thought if I just googled it I would have just got all the random stuff you normally find. Anyway, installing Mono now. Sorry for the hassle.
I like this mod. GOOD WORK!
I love the addon. It's cool to see what other people are doing and be able to share info.
I might be derping, but when I connect to a server, how do I actually view the game?
My game creeps crashing everytime I select a vehicle. Any idea how to fix this?

I would like to say.... "outstanding job!"....I tested a few days ago and been hosting my own server and joining the community server from time to time....and it works great. The only thing I have to do is run server /or client FIRST, lol then everything is fine. keep up the great work! also, did I see someone working on a co-op mod?....
